block_comment: This line of Verilog RTL code is used to assign the signal "pre_sysrst_minpulse_width_ok" based on a specific index of the array "pre_sysrst_cnt". More specifically, it extracts the 4th bit (as Verilog is 0-indexed) from the "pre_sysrst_cnt" binary counter array and assigns this value to "pre_sysrst_minpulse_width_ok". This operation can be commonly used to monitor or influence the control flow depending on the 4th bit's value of the counter.
